programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: When an extreme couponer's remains are found on the side of a road, the investigation leads the team to the supermarket where she shopped; Brennan adjusts to being at work and away from her baby; Cam is unhappy with her daughter's choice of suitors.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: A corpse that has been dyed blue is found in a landfill; when Bones feels uncomfortable in her post-baby body, Booth tries to boost her self-confidence.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: Booth and Brennan investigate the death of a truck company employee whose body is found in the woods; Hodgins buys new lab equipment; Brennan worries about Parker's return from England.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: When a corpse is discovered in the woods, the team considers two families involved in a nearly century-long feud; Brennan is apprehensive when her father (Ryan O'Neal) offers to baby-sit for her daughter.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: While in Los Angeles to consult on a film based on her latest book, Brennan discovers the prop cadaver being used is a murder victim; Booth gets a job offer; embarrassing information about Cam's past comes out.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: When a past suspect is back in court on appeal, Booth and Brennan work to prove he is guilty once and for all; Brennan becomes a suspect.

programme.title: MacGyver
programme.desc: While returning from capturing a war criminal, Mac and Jack's helicopter crashes, allowing the prisoner to escape.

programme.title: MacGyver
programme.desc: Mac and Jack must track down a corrupt FBI agent who has framed a man for murder; everyone on the team is terrified to get a performance review from the tough new boss.

programme.title: MacGyver
programme.desc: When Matty's goddaughter and her boyfriend are killed in a San Francisco park, Mac and the team investigate the crime and start to suspect that the 1970s Zodiac Killer has returned.

programme.title: MacGyver
programme.desc: While Mac and Jack are tracking a dangerous fugitive, a family of bounty hunters kidnap him; Bozer and Riley try to hack into Jack's CIA file.

programme.title: MacGyver
programme.desc: When Mac and the team are blamed for a terrorist bombing, the Phoenix Foundation is forced to disavow them; the team must clear their names without support from back home.

programme.title: MacGyver
programme.desc: After an earthquake in Hawaii, Mac and the team join Chin and Kono from the Five-0 task force to rescue a group of government scientists trapped in a building; another group tries to steal top-secret weaponry from the scientists.

programme.title: MacGyver
programme.desc: Mac's close friend from M.I.T. fakes her own death to prevent someone from killing her to suppress her scientific research.

programme.title: MacGyver
programme.desc: When the team intercepts a terror group's message for Murdoc, instructing him to kill a tech analyst, Mac poses as a psychopath to save the intended victim.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.sub-title: Ke Kanaka I Ha'ule Mai Ka Lewa Mai
programme.desc: When a vacationing father on a flight to Honolulu is kidnapped and forced to parachute midflight, Danny, Tani and Junior track him through the jungle to discover that he may not be who he seems; McGarrett is threatened with a secret from his past.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.sub-title: Mimiki Ke Kai, Ahuwale Ka Papa Leho
programme.desc: A heat wave hits Oahu, contributing to a spike in crime; McGarrett and Danny hunt down a bank thief; Tani and Junior's car is stolen while they're on duty; Kamekona incites a riot by price-gouging his ice.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.sub-title: A'ohe Kio Pohaku Nalo i Ke Alo Pali
programme.desc: Jerry accompanies Junior as he escorts a fallen soldier home to Oahu; McGarrett and Danny discover a body when they delve into the highly profitable black market for sand.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.desc: On Halloween, Jerry and his friends search his childhood camp for evidence to a murder he witnessed as a boy; McGarrett investigates a little girl who drew pictures depicting the scene of a recent murder before it was discovered.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.desc: McGarrett crosses the line and is arrested while investigating the death of his former SEAL buddy who died while making an emergency landing on an aircraft carrier; Adam returns to Oahu with devastating news about his marriage.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.sub-title: Pua a'e La Ka Uwahi O Ka Moe
programme.desc: McGarrett investigates a cold case that his grandfather and the famous Honolulu detective Chang Apana worked on in the 1940s; McGarrett and Danny get ready for the opening of their restaurant.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.desc: Grover's parents and brother arrive in Oahu for Thanksgiving; a thief is crushed to death by an empty safe.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.desc: When a renowned urban vigilante is killed after making a citizen's arrest, the team delves into the world of super heroes and comic books to find the killer; Adam gets closer to finding out who killed his sister.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.sub-title: Pio Ke Kukui, Pō'ele Ka Hale
programme.desc: After fighting off an assassin in his own home, McGarrett and Joe White flee to Montana to prepare for a battle against those exacting revenge for a past SEAL mission.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.sub-title: Hala I Ke Ala O'i'ole Mai
programme.desc: Still reeling from the murder of one of their own, Steve and Catherine, along with Danny, Junior and some old friends, hunt down the killer; a bag of human bones discovered inside an abandoned storage locker goes missing.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.sub-title: Ka Hauli O Ka Mea Hewa 'Ole, He Nalowale Koke
programme.desc: McGarrett and the team support Danny and Rachel by determining what happened when Grace gets into a life-threatening car accident; Tani helps Koa when his rehab patient goes missing.
